item.description: This week's mid-day recital at historic King's Chapel features Italian organist Ennio Cominetti performing music of Bach, Franck, Frescobaldi & Bossi on the magnificent C.B. Fisk Organ. Enjoy a mid-day music break at King's Chapel. Hailed by city residents and visitors alike as a treasure in the midst of a bustling city, this year-long series features a wide range of programming from classical to jazz and more! Your donation of $3 or more is given to the performers

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Ennio Cominetti, organista at Kings Chapel
